ValidationRule.description: Confirmed rate is not required for Status = Deferral with Sub Status equal Long Term Agreement. The confirmed Rate can be 0 (zero).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', Confirmed_Rate__c <= 0,
OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go early') ),
NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Long term agreement'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Price Target Set'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Sales Director Delegation'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Management decision') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Where status is Deferral or Go Early and the sub-status is not Long Term Agreement, Price Target Set, Sales Director Delegation or Management Decision the confirmed rate cannot be 0 or negative
